scenario_text.value: Hm? I wonder who’s over there?

Oh, it’s Saki and Floramon. I wonder what
they’re up to.

Only, I get the impression that now might be
a bad time to interrupt.

*sigh*... What am I gonna do? This isn’t
working at all...
I’m all pent-up, but I can’t let it out...

Huh, that doesn’t sound like you. It’s weird,
Saki! Real weird!

Normally you’ve got no problem coming right
out with what you want to say.
Exactly. Something’s just not right...
I’m so focused on Aoi, it makes me nervous.
I’m not normally like this at all.

(So this is about that thing with Aoi. I had
no idea it bothered her this much.)

I want to face her more...I don’t know,
properly?

Hmm... Well, why don’t you start with
a normal chit-chat or something!

I’m telling you, that’s easier said than
done...
Oh, I know just what to do!
Oh yeah? Tell me, tell me!
Floramon, can you be Aoi for me, here?
What? Why? I don’t get it.

That way I can practice talking with her! So
I won’t have such a hard time bringing it up.

Go on, Floramon! Talk to me like you’re Aoi,
okay?
...Saki!!!

I don’t think that’s quite right. Aoi doesn’t
talk like that.
No, Saki! Look out behind you!
What? No... You have got to be kidding me!
Stand back, Saki! Leave this to me!
Now, let’s see what you’ve got!
